name: Leaf Ash
description:
Leaf Ash is a 2D action game developed in Unity3D for Windows by the 2Weeks team. This game was created for the "Cozy Fall Jam 2022".

The general theme of the jam is "anything fall related" with "Trading Places" being the additional theme.

You play as Ash the leaf collector. Your goal is to collect as many leaves as you can before they touch the ground.
You can upgrade Ash's grasp and agility with the help of Ash's friends.

Controls:

A,D -> Move

SpaceBar -> Trade your place with its diametrically opposed place but get slowed

E -> Skip dialogs

R -> Restart your current level

Mouse -> Use the mouse to accept or decline an offer from the seller.


Leaves are swell

Leaves are all

Leaves are gonna make me whole



All assets were created by the 2Weeks Team.

Game Design: Vangelis Pappas

Programming: Isidoros Tsoulkas

Art & Graphics: Mars Blackbird

Audio: Vangelis Pappas
